==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=一朵鲜花插在牛粪上|type=11211111}}

===Etymology===
Literally: A bouquet of flowers stuck into a pile of cow manure.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=一duǒ xiānhuā chā zài niúfèn shàng
|c=jat1 do2 sin1 faa1 caap3 zoi6 ngau4 fan3 soeng6,jat1 doe2 sin1 faa1 caap3 zoi6 ngau4 fan3 soeng6
|cat=id
}}

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# a beautiful or talented woman who marries an ugly or untalented husband

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|好花插在牛糞上}}
